title: Music of Light & Darkness (ambient background)
description: 10 Orchestral Soundtracks ~2 mins each / Two music categories ("The Light" & "Darkness")
longDescription:
HIGH QUALITY MUSIC FEATURING LIVE MUSICIANS!


The MUSIC OF LIGHT & DARKNESS collection containing 10 original ambient orchestral soundtracks:

>SHORT PREVIEW< 

>FULL PREVIEW<


TWO MUSIC "CATEGORIES" INCLUDED:

  1. Dark, Ominous & Mysterious (5 items)
  2. Calm, Rich & Warm (5 items)


Each soundtrack is ~2 mins length and esily can be used in "musical context" of:

  • Town/Village
  • Open world
  • Main Menu
  • Tavern/Inn
  • Dungeon
  • Exploring
  • Leveling
  • Trailer
  • any kind of game location etc...


FROM video games to an AAA cinematic projects...


The music is not loopable however you can repeat it over and over smoothly on the background.

It's not limited by any means! :)


=======================

⚠️YOUTUBE-SAFE MUSIC⚠️

=======================

The music is cleared with YouTube and can be freely used without any concerns of copyright strikes, flags, or demonetization. This is essential if you expect players to showcase your game in videos or streams!

(i.e. you will never get a copyright claim and ALSO you are allowed to use the soundtracks wherever you want and as many times as you need)

It means Unlimited Royalty-Free license! Use the music over and over, in any of your project or productions, without any additional fees or royalties.


=================

PRODUCT SUPPORT

=================

in case you are experiencing any kind of issues while using my product, please feel free to contact me directly at any time so I can help you out as quick as possible.

⚠️If you need just the *wav files — contact me after purchase.⚠️


===========================================================================

  • 10 high-quality *WAV tracks (16-bit; 1411 kb/s; 44.1 kHz)
  • Over 20 minutes of emotional & beautiful music
  • Wide variety of musical themes and emotions (from the light side to the darkness)
  • 185mb of compressed audio data (*zip)
  • YouTube-Safe music tracks
  • Unlimited Royalty-Free license

===========================================================================
